summary: The story of the Pre-Fab Four and their fight to be taken seriously as musicians.
cast: George Stanchev|L.B. Fisher|Jeff Geddis|Aaron Lohr|Colin Ferguson|Wallace Langham|Stephen Bogaert|Polly Shannon|Jim Thorburn|Sarah Lafleur|Toby Proctor|Balázs Koós|Jeffrey R. Smith|Joe Matheson|Charlotte Leonard|Karley Marek|Edward Glen|Jeff Ironi|Christopher Crumb|Jason Knight|Colin Evans|Graham Harley|Katie Griffin|Tim Hall|Larry Bain|Jennifer Foster|Connor Cunningham|Tony Springer|Robert B. Kennedy|Ron Payne|Paul A. MacFarlane|Courtney Hawkrigg|Amanda May|Nicole Dicker|Lillian Lewis|Kevin Hare|Jamie Ferenczi|Peter Tork
title: Cazadores de sueños
